name: Jedi Knight Bot File
summary: Bot file used by Star Wars Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy, a Star Wars game that gives the Jedi the choice to follow the light or dark side; contains data for bots' personalities that are controlled by the computer; referenced throughout the game to determine bots' behavior, such as what messages they say to you, their reflexes, their accuracy, and if they can carry a light saber.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Raven Software Star Wars Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy

macos.display_name: Raven Software Star Wars Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy
